answers.answer: I had gestational diabetes and I was SO HUNGRY at night.  Drink a small cup of 2% milk and you'll feel fuller.
I'm about to get a snack and I don't drink 2% anymore I drink 1%

question: I don't know what to do :( I was put on this diet because of gestational diabetes and I go walking twice a day and since being in my 3rd trimester I've been hungry more :( I do get a snack but I'm worried I won't loose anymore weight. (I'm overweight so my doctor wants me to loose rather then gain)
title: im so hungry!!!!
